channel.title: Need help on the following things
channel.description:
Well, When i attack kalphite queen, my server messes up, how would i be able to fix this?
And, How i add bow specs?, 50% spec bar required.
Also, How i change xp rate per hit on monsters? Atm, its very very very slow..
Thanks all who help, Very much!

item.title: Need help on the following things

item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

Yeah My Kalphite has been messed up too… cept after u get to her secound stage, theres not way to attack her o,o

item.title: Need help on the following things
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

When i attack kalphite queen, my server messes up, how would i be able to fix this?

Kalphite is bugged almost on every server. If your using client - Mopar, or silab. You need the correct client to see the hp, text, and maybe including prayer.

How i add bow specs?, 50% spec bar required.

Methods, booleans. Etc.

Read full topic
